description.message: r3fresh your chrome url without touching a button.

browser_action.description: The default tooltip on the icon

@protocol_not_supported.message: Sorry, the protocol used on this page is not supported.
@protocol_not_supported.description: When the protocol used is not support on a URL.

@file_protocol_needs_enabling.message: Sorry, the file:// protocol needs enabling. Please check the "Allow access to file URLs" for r3fresh on the extensions page (chrome://extensions/).
@file_protocol_needs_enabling.description: When the protocol file:// needs enabling

@live.description: The badge text for a live page

@disable_on_this_page.description: Icon hover text to disable r3fresh

@disable_on_this_host.description: Icon hover text to disable r3fresh for entire host

@enable_on_this_page.description: Icon hover text to enable r3fresh

@enable_on_this_host.description: Icon hover text to enable r3fresh for entire host

@options_url_list_empty.message: No URLs are currently live, clicking the icon next to the address bar will make a page live :)
@options_url_list_empty.description: Fallback message for when extension has not been activated on any pages yet

@options_clear_all.description: Options Page: label for button that clears all active URLs

@options_refresh_rate_note.message: Working on a live production server should be 250ms or higher.
@options_refresh_rate_note.description: English: Working on a live production server should be 250ms or higher.

@options_persist_scroll_points.message: Attempt to persist scroll X/Y positions
@options_persist_scroll_points.description: English: Attempt to persist scroll X/Y positions

@options_entire_hosts.description: English: Run r3fresh on entire domain

@options_ignore_anchors.description: Ignore everything after # in a URL.

@options_ignore_hidden_fields.description: English: Ignore hidden fields in HTML

@options_allow_access_to_files.message: Make sure you have ticked "Allow access to file URLs" for the r3fresh extension.
@options_allow_access_to_files.description: Inform user to enable 'Allow access to file URLs' on the extensions page

@options_sell_link.message: If you really like r3fresh, please consider installing the paid version.

@options_review_link.message: If you like r3fresh, please leave a sweet review.

@options_contribute_and_support.description: English: Contribute & install via paid version
